entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Charlottetown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:32 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlottetown Airport 07:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -1.9°C
Wind: WSW 23 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023
